page.title: 12Media
page.content: Without a doubt the main coverage of local affairs and events is to be found in the "Leader". For the area of Aberaman, Godreaman, Cwmaman and Abercwmboi the Aberdare Leader is produced but for the area of Glenboi the "Mountain Ash Leader" is produced. The "Leader" was first printed in 1901 and within the Cynon Valley it has high readership figures; but, unfortunately in the past several years these figures have fallen slightly, this is most probably due to the increase in the number of video recorders. The area has not had any books written on it in recent years. One great literary figure to come from Cwmaman was the poet Alun Lewis. He was one of this century's renowned poets but he unfortunately died during the Second World War.
